    Tarantulas, Hell Beast, and Paralysis stand before Black Aracnia's ship. 
It was a large Predacon War Vessle. Not as big as the Iron Fist....nothing 
was as big as that monstrasity. This ship was just big, and credited with its 
bulk size to its many victories, that is before it became grounded on 
prehistoric earth.
    "The dissection of the engines will be difficult. We wont be needing them 
where were going. Ive already drawn up the plans for the Marine Thrust 
System, with its speed we should make excellent surprize time." Tarantulas 
said, holding the blue prints of the Sub as the other two looked on.
    Hell Beast noted, "Also, we wont need half the rooms and equitment in the 
ship. Once we move all that out it will give us a chance to make the Sub 
manuverable. Labs, holding cells, computer systems.....all that can be placed 
in storage at Kitkats base."
    Tarantulas nodded. With that gone, it would be smaller. And with the new 
wepon implacements installed, it would be a half bad fighter. What most 
pleased him were the Torpedo Launchers that were in the works. Even Megatron 
said how fantastic they were.
    "Hehehe, yes. Lets begin the dissection. The shuttle is on its way." The 
spider said, turning skyward to the long shuttle, designed for hauling heavy 
equitment, came into view.

    Rampage gazed outward across the ocean waves. The sparks from the welder 
burned a little, but the breeze eased his sting. The platform was nearing 
completion. He stopped and looked behinde him at the platform.
    A large grey metal platform jetted out of the beach and shollow ocean 
port. They had slapped it together for the construction of the submarine. 
Inferno and Tankkor paced back and forth, double checking the work the had 
just done. According to the plan, the shuttle would land soon.
    "Inferno, stop dawdling and make sure you have all the bolts tightened. 
Clear?" He boasted from his upper position. Inferno looked up, and did as he 
was told.
    Once agian, he turned to the waves and the blue sky. Off in the distance 
lay kitkats base and a hive of angry, vengeful, and egar Predacons that were 
going to win this thing.
